articles.title: Enlarged Joint Meeting of C.C., WPK and Its KPA Committee Guided by Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Enlarged Joint Meeting of C.C., WPK and Its KPA Committee Presided by Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- An enlarged joint meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean People's Army (KPA) Committee of the WPK took place in Pyongyang on February 2-3.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA, guided the enlarged joint meeting.
					
					 Attending it were officials of the WPK Central Committee and members of the Party Committee of the KPA.
					
					 Leading party officials of commissions and ministries and local areas and officials of armed organs were present as observers.
					
					 The meeting had an in-depth discussion on the principled issues arising in further strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as required by the developing revolution on the occasion of the 7th WPK Congress to be recorded as a new landmark in the history of the Party. It criticized mainly the practices of seeking privileges, misuse of authority, abuse of power and bureaucratism manifested in the party and proposed tasks and ways for thoroughly overcoming them.
					
					 Before declaring the meeting open, Kim Jong Un noted that it is the first time in the history of the WPK to have this meeting.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the meeting is a historic event in further developing the WPK into the powerful political staff of the Songun (army-first) revolution and a motherly Party sharing its fate with popular masses and consolidating the integrated whole of the Party and the people as firm as a rock, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a conclusion.
					
					 He said that the meeting is of weighty significance in further strengthening the Party organizationally and ideologically, rallied close around its Central Committee with one thought and purpose, with the whole party moving as one under the monolithic leadership of the Party.
					
					 He set forth the tasks and ways for intensifying the work to imbue the whole society with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thoroughly establishing the monolithic leadership system of the Party.
					
					 Our revolutionary faith will grow stronger as our revolution which started with struggle and advances with it is faced with manifold difficulties and ordeals, he said, adding that nobody in the world can block our way.
					
					 The enlarged joint meeting, presided by Kim Jong Un, marked a significant occasion in consolidating the unbreakable unity and cohesion of the leader, party, army and people as firm as a rock and realizing the modeling of the whole party and society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on a new higher stage as required by the important historic period of the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Wu Dawei Leaves
articles.content:
Wu Dawei Leaves 
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Wu Dawei, special envoy of the Chinese government for the Affairs of the Korean Peninsula, and his party flew back on Thursday. 
					 During their stay they paid a courtesy call on DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and had talks with DPRK Vice-Minister of Foreign Affaires Ri Yong Ho. 
					
					 At the conversation and talks they exchanged views on the relations between the DPRK and China and issues of mutual concern including the regional situation.

articles.title: Greetings to National Executive Committee of Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
articles.content:
Greetings to National Executive Committee of Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Thursday sent a message of greeting to the National Executive Committee of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of the founding of the party.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries and sincerely wished the party bigger successes in its activities to strengthen the party and achieve the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Maithripala Sirisena, president of Sri Lanka, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Sri Lanka would grow stronger in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries and wished the people of Sri Lanka prosperity.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Sri Lankan PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Sri Lankan PM
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Ranil Wickremasinghe, prime minister of Sri Lanka, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in all fields and wished the prime minister and the government of Sri Lanka greater success in the work for the country's political stability, economic development and people's well-being.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Mangala Samraweear, minister of Foreign Affairs of Sri Lanka.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Qatar
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Qatar
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Monday sent a congratulatory message to Sheikh Mohamed Bin Abdulrahman Al Thani upon his appointment as foreign minister of Qatar.
					 The message expressed belief that the exchange and cooperation between the foreign ministries of the two countries for developing the good relations of friendship and cooperation would steadily grow stronger and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting Held for Staff Members of Russian Embassy
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting Held for Staff Members of Russian Embassy
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry Thursday arranged a friendship meeting for staff members of the Russian embassy here on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Present there on invitation were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung and other officials of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 Kung said that this year is a significant year marking the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's official visit to the Russian Federation and adoption of the DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration and the fifth anniversary of his visit to the Siberian and Far East Regions.
					
					 He hoped that the excellent tradition of friendship and good neighborliness would be given steady continuity and the bilateral relations be developed in a mutually beneficial and comprehensive manner in the interests of the people of the two countries in 2016, too.
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora said that lots of visits of high-ranking officials and large-scale events took place in the two countries last year, the year of the Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 Russia will as ever make positive efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries, he said, adding we will together overcome any difficulties lying in our way.
					
					 The participants talked about boosting the exchange and cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.

articles.title: Remodeled Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons Goes Operational
articles.content:
Remodeled Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons Goes Operational 
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Kumkop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons was successfully remodeled. 
					 All the production processes of the factory have been put on the most intensive, automated, unmanned, germ-free and dust-free basis. 
					
					 There took place a ceremony of marking the completion of the project on Thursday. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Ri Jong Mu, officials concerned, officials and employees of the factory, teachers and researchers of relevant units and officers and members of the High-Speed Youth Shock Brigade who took part in the project. 
					
					 Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in an address that the factory built under the loving care of leader Kim Jong Il has turned into the general foodstuff production base which has been updated at the highest level under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He called on the officials and employees of the factory to exalt the honor of the factory taking the lead in carrying out the party's policy in the spirit of self-reliance, favored by the people and make a positive contribution to the building of a sporting power house and improving the standard of people's living. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the factory.

articles.title: Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
articles.content:
Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and workers and a DPRK hero took place at the Cultural Hall of the Songyo Knitwear Factory Thursday on the occasion of February 8, the birth anniversary of the regular revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					 DPRK Hero Ji Yong Chun, a lecturer at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, said that the Korean revolutionary armed forces have developed into the genuine army of the leader and party generation after generation under the care of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He noted that the path of bloody struggle and glorious road of victory covered by the Korean People's Army are associated with their immortal leadership exploits.

articles.title: Korean Film Show Held to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Korean Film Show Held to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- There took place a Korean film show at the Taedongmun Cinema on Thursday in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and their embassy officials and representatives of international bodies here. 
					
					 Among the audience were Kim In Bom, vice-minister of Culture and general director of the General Bureau of Film, officials concerned and creators and artistes in the movie field. 
					
					 The participants enjoyed the Korean feature film "Rice Flower".

articles.title: 6th National Cooking Competition Held
articles.content:
6th National Cooking Competition Held 
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The 6th National Cooking Competition took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House from Feb. 2 to 4 with the approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 The competition was divided into the panels of the General Bureau of Public Service, external service and service of ministries and national institutions, public catering establishments in Pyongyang and every province. It brought together more than 300 cooks and waitresses of 49 units. 
					
					 Waitresses also showed their service techniques.
					
					 On display there were catfish soup, rabbit soup, potato preserved in honey, etc. 
					
					 Designated dishes prepared by cooks from Okryu Restaurant, Pyongyang Koryo Hotel and other units were highly appreciated by participants for unique taste.

articles.title: Korean Stamp Show Held in China
articles.content:
Korean Stamp Show Held in China
 Beijing, February 3 (KCNA) -- A Korean stamp show for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was held in Beijing on Tuesday and Wednesday.
					 Displayed at the venue of the show were a commemorative stamp issued on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star and stamps showing photos dealing with the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were at least 320 kinds of stamps showing Songun Korea ushering in a golden age in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, time-honored history and bright culture of the Korean nation and the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Chinese officials concerned and philatelists.
					
					 Li Xin, chairman of the Sino-DPRK Stamp Society, praised the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the development of the DPRK-China friendly relations and wished the Korean people greater successes in the drive for building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Bag Cloth Production Line Newly Installed
articles.content:
Bag Cloth Production Line Newly Installed
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill was recently equipped with a bag cloth production line.
					 The homegrown line, consisted of flexible rapier looms, high-temperature high-pressure roller dyeing machines, etc., is producing bag cloth with homemade tetron rayon yarn.
					
					 The bag cloth is superior in its technical indices like elasticity and tensile strength. And the roller dyeing machine is a modern apparatus with high accuracy which automatically controls the whole process of dyeing.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the textile mill some days ago and was very pleased to see various shapes of school bags.

articles.title: Real-time Surveillance and Control System Established
articles.content:
Real-time Surveillance and Control System Established
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The real-time surveillance and control system has been established between hygienic and anti-epidemic centers in the DPRK as part of the efforts to improve the hygienic and anti-epidemic activities.
					 The system is a preventive warning system based on IT which helps those centers monitor and inform possible outbreak of diseases and take necessary measures against them by ensuring close connection between them.
					
					 Thanks to the establishment of this system, health officials in different parts of the country can receive on-the-spot training courses, acquaint themselves with the indexes of disease occurrences in localities and thus take advance measures.
					
					 The establishment of the system is of great significance in implementing the policy on preventive medicine of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Electronic Laughing Mirrors at Rungna People's Pleasure Park
articles.content:
Electronic Laughing Mirrors at Rungna People's Pleasure Park
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Laughing House at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park is attracting more visitors nowadays.
					 Recently, movable electronic laughing mirrors were co-developed by the IT Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology and the Information Exchange Company under the Rungna People's Pleasure Park Management Office and debuted at the pleasure park.
					
					 The mirrors show scores of varied images, causing great laughter among visitors.
					
					 Yang Ho Rim, president of the company, told KCNA that researchers developed software and designed wry shapes to get greater laughing effects.
					
					 It is expected that such mirrors would be sent to pleasure parks in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Foundation-Stone Relics of Palhae Kingdom
articles.content:
Foundation-Stone Relics of Palhae Kingdom
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Palhae Kingdom (698-926) was a thriving country in the East that inherited Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668).
					 Among its remains are 24 foundation-stone relics unearthed in different parts of the DPRK. The relics are believed to be conducive to strengthening the power of the kingdom.
					
					 24 basaltic stones in three rows, each with 8 stones, were unearthed around Kumsong-ri Tomb No.1, an earth-covered stone grave of Palhae Kingdom, in Hwadae County, North Hamgyong Province which was confirmed to have commonness with graves of Koguryo Kingdom.
					
					 Such foundation-stone relics were discovered in Hoemun-ri of Orang County, Songphyong District of Chongjin City and Tonghung-ri of Kim Chaek City in North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The stones are 70-90 centimeters in length, width and height respectively.
					
					 From roofing tiles and household goods unearthed around foundation stones, the relics are believed to serve as relay stations.
					
					 Palhae Kingdom built a net of relay stations throughout its territory as part of the efforts to bolster its power.
					
					 The 24 foundation-stone relics are of great significance in studying the history and culture of Palhae Kingdom which had consolidated the centralized feudal ruling system on the basis of developed traffic and communication network.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Build Missile Shield for Dominating World
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Build Missile Shield for Dominating World
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. is more vociferously crying out for pressing ahead with the establishment of the missile defense system, talking about the "missile threat" from someone.
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean military boss echoed the U.S. assertion by claiming that it is necessary to examine the issue of deploying THAAD in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says that the U.S. is underscoring the need to deploy THAAD in south Korea in order to defend not only it but also its allies from the "threat from north Korea" but its assertion is nothing but poor sophism for covering up its sinister intention.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The projected deployment of THAAD in south Korea is a product of the military strategy of the U.S. to turn south Korea into an advanced base for aggression in a bid to hold strategic hegemony in Northeast Asia and contain the regional powers with an unchallenged edge. 
					
					 It is well known that if THAAD is deployed in south Korea, major military bases of those countries around the DPRK will come within the operational range of its radar.
					
					 Whoever is not ignorant of military affairs may guess the objective of the U.S. deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 It is beyond doubt that its deployment will kick off a fresh Cold War in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. ever more undisguised moves to build a missile shield in the Asia-Pacific region to get a strategic edge would put world peace and security at greater peril. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to give up its foolish attempt to hold military hegemony.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Can Never Get Rid of Abyss of Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Can Never Get Rid of Abyss of Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean people's actions to punish the treacherous and conservative regime are mounting higher than ever before, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Diverse actions are taking place in various areas in protest against the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. They include the issue of declarations on the situation by civic and public organizations, signature campaigns, rallies, demonstrations, wall-paper display and legal action. Workers launched general strikes in protest against the conservative authorities' moves for the retrogressive revision of the labor law, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The fierce anti-"government" struggles of the south Korean people are an inevitable product of the unprecedented misrule of the present conservative ruling forces keen on treachery going against the will and demand of the popular masses.
					
					 The group of traitors' ruin is the inevitability of history as they are selling off the country against its people's will.
					
					 The Syngman Rhee dictatorial regime installed by the U.S. was overthrown by the April 19 Popular Uprising like a castle on the sand and the outrageous "yusin" regime met a miserable end due to the October resistance for democracy.
					
					 The June People's Resistance and subsequent struggles for democracy culminated in the downfall of military dictators of the "fifth republic" and "sixth republic." The ill-famed "civilian" dictatorship was also buried in the grave of history. The present south Korean chief executive is fated to follow in footsteps of her predecessors forsaken by the people.
					
					 With no desperate effort can the south Korean conservative group get rid of the abyss of ruin. Suppression is not a cure-all and fascist tyrant is short-lived.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Protest Labor Reform Guidelines
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Protest Labor Reform Guidelines
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean workers waged anti-"government" actions in Seoul on Jan. 29 and 30 in protest against the authorities' unwarranted labor policy.
					 The south Korean Federation of Trade Unions held a rally for vowing an all-out struggle with the attendance of representatives of affiliated trade unions at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on Jan. 29.
					
					 Speakers denounced the "government's labor reform" guidelines as the retrogressive revision of the labor law and anti-people bill killing economy.
					
					 They vowed to wage field action to annul the "government's" prejudiced policy of standing for the capital interests.
					
					 They pledged to judge the regime and political party pressing for the retrogressive revision of the labor law at the coming general elections in April.
					
					 The joint action headquarters made up of trade unions in the manufacturing field of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions also held a press conference in Seoul that day where they branded the guidelines on the retrogressive revision of the labor law as illegal.
					
					 10,000 workers belonging to the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions staged a rally outside the Seoul City Office on Jan. 30.

articles.title: Acquittal of Chairman of KCTU Demanded
articles.content:
Acquittal of Chairman of KCTU Demanded 
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court of south Korea held a trial of Han Sang Gyun, chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU), on Jan. 29.
					 Last year the police issued a warrant of arrest for him for the mere reason that he led an illegal demonstration and arrested him in December by hurling a huge repressive force.
					
					 At the trial his counsel said that Han just participated in a rally and had never made any conspiracy in an illegal rally and demonstration.
					
					 A clash occurred between police and participants in the rally in those days because police were the first to throw a cordon with buses on the scene of the demonstration, it held.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Slammed for Overlooking Japan's Arrogant Act
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Slammed for Overlooking Japan's Arrogant Act
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News in an editorial on Feb. 1 denounced the conservative group for failing to protest against the Japanese authorities' arrogant act of denying the past crimes related to the sexual slavery.
					 The editorial recalled that as regards the question raised by the UN Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women recently the Japanese government gave an answer that there was no evidence proving the forcible drafting of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 This shows that Japan is still denying the coercion involved in the sexual slavery before the international community, it said, condemning the Japanese authorities' double-dealing and hypocritical act.
					
					 The editorial demanded the authorities lodge an official protest with the Japanese government, probe the historic truth about the monstrous human rights abuses perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists and conduct activities for solidarity with the international community.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Arrests Leading Members of Progressive Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Arrests Leading Members of Progressive Organization
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Taejon District Prosecutor's Office of south Korea arrested leading members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, a progressive civic organization, on Wednesday, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The prosecution charged that they organized the Korea solidarity in November, 2011 and formed regional solidarities and conducted activities sympathizing with the ideology and social system of the north till 2013.
					
					 It took such action on the charge that members of the Korea solidarity staged a surprise demonstration outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul in protest against the U.S. monstrous germ test in December last year.

articles.title: Nullification of "Guidelines" for Retrogressive Revision of Labor Law Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nullification of "Guidelines" for Retrogressive Revision of Labor Law Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions on Tuesday jointly held a press conference in protest against the "guidelines" announced by the authorities for retrogressive revision of the labor law, according to the south Korean MBC. 
					 Speakers said the "guidelines" were null and void as they were illegally decided by the "government" by abusing executive right and judicial power. 
					
					 The human rights committee should thoroughly investigate this case, they stressed, presenting a written petition demanding the withdrawal of the "guidelines". 
					
					 They expressed the will to intensify the solidarity actions to check the retrogressive revision of the labor law by the authorities with the joint press conference as a momentum.

articles.title: Chongryon Headquarters Chairmen Meet
articles.content:
Chongryon Headquarters Chairmen Meet
 Tokyo, February 3 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of chairmen of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on January 29. 
					 Present at the meeting were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and its vice-chairmen, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, department directors of its Central Standing Committee, the permanent advisor and the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, the rector of Korean University and chairmen of the headquarters of Chongryon. 
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report stressed the need for the chairmen to arouse all organizations to the general advance with the steadfast ideological will in order to fully demonstrate the might of Chongryon all over the world in this significant year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.
					
					 He referred to the tasks to be fulfilled by the chairmen of headquarters in the struggle of this historic year. 
					
					 Chairmen of the Chongryon headquarters in their speeches expressed the will to fully implement the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and New Year's congratulatory message and greet the Seventh Congress of the WPK with unprecedented achievements.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted on Russian Website
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The full text of the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un was posted on the Russian Irkutsk website on January 26.
					 It was illustrated with his photo.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Germany, Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Germany, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Germany and Nigeria between January 25 and 30 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 They included meetings of the German Communist Party and the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany, a photo and book exhibition at the building of the Niger State Government of Nigeria and film shows at two companies in Nigeria.
					
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were books and photos introducing the successes achieved by the Korean army and people.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Songdowon International Children's Camp".
					
					 The chairman of the German Communist Party said that it is one of precious Songun revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Jong Il that he made sure that the Korean People's Army demonstrated its might as the invincible army and creator of the people's happiness with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Speakers including the permanent secretary of the Niger State Government of Nigeria said that through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities Kim Jong Il proved the scientific accuracy of socialism and inevitability of its triumph, firmly defended the destiny of socialism and ushered in a turning phase for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on January 27.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from January 27 to February 16 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to praise the noble career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Helsinki, Finland on January 24.
					 Juha Kieksi, international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League who doubles as chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Thailand
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Thailand
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A Thai preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a seminar, photo exhibition, film show and other colorful political and cultural events to praise the exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on January 23.
					 Vadim Kudimin, director of the institute, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 74th birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de sesion conjunta de CC de PTC y Comite de PTC en EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige reunion ampliada de sesion conjunta de CC de PTC y Comite de PTC en EPC
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 2 y 3 en esta capital la reunion ampliada de la sesion conjunta del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite del PTC en el Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la reunion ampliada. 
					
					Asistieron ahi los funcionarios del CC del PTC y los miembros del Comite del PTC en el EPC. 
					
					Y estuvieron presentes en calidad de observadores los funcionarios directivos partidistas de los comites, ministerios y de localidades, y los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas populares.
					
					En este conclave se discutieron profundamente los problemas de principios para fortalecer mas el PTC como glorioso partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il de acuerdo con la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo con motivo del VII Congreso del PTC que marcara un nuevo hito en la historia del PTC, se criticaron intensivamente el abuso de los privilegios, la autoridad especial y el burocratismo latentes en el interior del partido y se presentaron las tareas y remedios para frustrarlos. 
					
					Antes de la reunion, el Mariscal dijo que se convoca por primera vez en la historia del PTC la reunion ampliada de la sesion conjunta del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite del PTC en el EPC y declaro la apertura de la reunion. 
					
					En el conclave hubo un informe e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores ratificaron que la presente reunion constituye un acontecimiento historico para fortalecer el PTC como poderoso Estado Mayor politico de la Revolucion Coreana y partido madre que comparte la vida y la muerte con las masas populares y consolidar mas la unidad monolitica entre el partido y las masas populares, en acato a la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jon Un. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra de conclusion, el Mariscal apunto que el presente foro reviste una gran importancia en fortalecer mas el partido en lo ideologico y organizativo unido con la unica idea y voluntad bajo la unica direccion del Comite Central del PTC. 
					
					Y presento las tareas y remedios para profundizar las labores para unificar toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y establecer estrictamente el sistema de la unica direccion del partido. 
					
					Asevero que se hara mas firme nuestra fe revolucionaria por mas que se interpongan las vicisitudes en el camino de nuestra revolucion, y destaco que nadie puede impedir nuestra marcha.
					
					El presente foro dirigido por el Mariscal sirvio de un motivo significativo en consolidar como una muralla de acero la inquebrantable unidad entre lider, el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo y llevar a una nueva etapa elevada la transformacion de todo el partido y toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo conforme a la demanda de la epoca importante e historica de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Regresan Wu Dawei y su comitiva
articles.content:
Regresan Wu Dawei y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Partieron de regreso hoy Wu Dawei, delegado especial del gobierno chino para el  problema de la Peninsula Coreana, y su comitiva.
					  Durante su estancia, Wu y su comitiva realizaron una visita de cortesia al canciller coreano Ri Su Yong, y las conversaciones con el vicecanciller Ri Yong Ho.
					
					  En las ocasiones, se intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los problemas de interes mutuo inclusive las relaciones bilaterales de la RPDC y China y la situacion regional.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita dia de fundacion de PRT
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita dia de fundacion de PRT
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al Comite Ejecutivo Nacional del Partido Revolucionario de Tanzania, en ocasion del 39o aniversario de la fundacion de ese pais africano.
					La misiva expresa la conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion establecidas entre ambos partidos se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas de acuerdo con los intereses de los pueblos de dos paises. Y desea de todo corazon mayores exitos en las actividades del PRT por intensificar su organizacion y lograr la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: MINREX ofrece encuentro de amistad para miembros de embajada rusa
articles.content:
MINREX ofrece encuentro de amistad para miembros de embajada rusa
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo Lunar 105 (2016) de la Era Juche, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 4 un encuentro de amistad para los miembros de la embajada de la Federacion Rusa en la RPDC.
					  A la ocasion fueron invitados el embajador Alexandr Matsegora y los miembros de la sede diplomatica de Rusia.
					
					  Tambien estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y otros funcionarios del MINREX.
					
					  En el encuentro hubo discursos.
					
					  Kung dijo que este ano es el significativo en que se cumplen el 15o aniversario de la visita oficial del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a la Federacion Rusa y la aprobacion de la declaracion de Moscu Corea-Rusia y el 5o aniversario de su visita a Siberia y la region del Lejano Oriente.
					
					  Deseo que en 2016 tambien sigan las buenas tradiciones de amistad y buena vecindad y las relaciones bilaterales se desarrollaren de manera de beneficio mutuo y en su totalidad conforme al interes de los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					   Alexandr Matsegora, recordo que en el ano pasado, ano de amistad Rusia-Corea en dos paises se realizaron muchos viajes de alto rango y variadas actividades de gran tamano.
					
					  Enfatizo que tambien en el futuro, se esforzara con teson por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de los dos paises y agrego que superaran cualesquier dificultades que les impiden el camino a seguir por nosotros.
					
					  Los participantes profundizaron el sentimiento de amistad hablando de la necesidad de desarrollar mas el intercambio y cooperacion entre Corea y Rusia.

articles.title: Inaugurado Combinado de Alimentos Kumkop para Deportistas
articles.content:
Inaugurado Combinado de Alimentos Kumkop para Deportistas
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Fue reconstruido magnificamente el Combinado de Alimentos Kumkop para Deportistas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Todos los procesos productivos de dicho combinado fueron altamente intensificados y se realizaron en alto nivel la automatizacion, la no intervencion del hombre y la esterilizacion sin polvos.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 4 la ceremonia inaugural del Combinado.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de Deportes Ri Jong Mu, los funcionarios de las ramas interesadas y los del combinado y sus empleados, los profesores e investigadores de las unidades relacionadas y los comandantes y miembros de la Brigada de Choque Juvenil Batalla de Velocidad que participaron en la obra.
					
					  El jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Il Hwan, pronuncio el discurso inaugural.
					
					  Dijo que la fabrica, construida por el amor del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se ha convertido hoy en una base de alimentos en que se realizo en el supremo nivel la modernizacion bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  Subrayo que los funcionarios y los empleados deben hacer valer mas el honor de su fabrica que toma delantera en la materializacion de la politica del Partido, se apoya en sus propias fuerzas y goza de buena reputacion del pueblo y asi contribuir mucho a la construccion de la potencia deportiva y la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					  Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes recorrieron el Combinado.
